#summary structure of a directory in the client root.

= {{{.prebake}}} directory structure =

{{{
<client-root>/
    .prebake/
        pid
        hashes.bdb
        cmd_pipe
}}}

The PreBakery service creates a directory on startup and deletes it on shutdown.

=== {{{<client-root>/.prebake/pid}}} ===

Contains the process id of the PreBakery service.

=== {{{<client-root>/.prebake/hashes.bdb}}} ===

Contains a [http://www.oracle.com/database/berkeley-db/index.html Berkeley DB] mapping file paths under [ClientRoot <client-root>] to MD5 hashes of those files.

=== {{{<client-root>/.prebake/.cmd_pipe}}} ===

Is a named pipe that the [PreBake prebake] command uses to kick off builds using the PreBakeCommand grammar.
